bibl.title: A New Fragment of the Bodmer Aspis.
bibl.note: P. Bodmer XXVI + P. Colon. Inv. 904 [ed.: Reinhold MERKELBACH, Wartetext 2: P. Colon. inv. 904. Komödienfragment, ZPE 1 (1967) pp. 103-104 et pl. II] + P. Robinson Inv. 38. - Aspis 487-498 and 525-535.
WILLIS William H., A New Fragment of the Bodmer Aspis.
Eric HANDLEY et André HURST (Édd.), Relire Ménandre (Genève, 1990) pp. 167-171, 2 figg.
